body:
Only in hentai would this ever be the outcome of one guy fucking two siblings and a third finding out. He wouldn't have a dick, they'd 
Lorena Bobbitt his Japanese soldier.
Chapter 2 was translated by Fakku but chapter 1 isn't.
@Protohentai my friend, hentai transcends all types of language barriers. So no need for translations to get any messages across ;)
Finally translated.. now i can understand my hentai
Where can i find the first two chapters?
